xwikidoc.name: UserDirectoryTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: XWiki.UserDirectoryPreferencesClass_columns=Columns to display ### Missing: XWiki.UserDirectoryPreferencesClass_columns_hint=The list of columns, corresponding to properties of the User class, to be displayed in the user directory ### Missing: XWiki.UserDirectoryPreferencesClass_hideDisabledProfiles=Hide disabled user profiles ### Missing: XWiki.UserDirectoryPreferencesClass_hideDisabledProfiles_hint=Exclude from the user directory the users that have their profile disabled
### Missing: userdirectory.userScopeFilter=User scope: ### Missing: userdirectory.userScopeFilter.hint=Select the category of users you want to display. userdirectory.userScopeFilter.local=Lokálne užívatelia userdirectory.userScopeFilter.global=Užívatelia, ktorí sú členmi tejto wiki. ### Missing: userdirectory.configuration.title=Settings ### Missing: userdirectory.configuration.columns.editHint=Click to select the columns
platform.userdirectory.customizeNotAllowed=Nemáte právo upravovať tento adresár. platform.userdirectory.configTitle=Konfigurácia užívateľského adresára platform.userdirectory.configSheetTitle=Konfigurácia užívateľského adresára ### Missing: platform.userdirectory.configSheetApplyOnConfiguration=This sheet must be applied on the UserDirectory Configuration document.
